entry.title: WIND WARNING IN EFFECT, Grise Fiord
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 at times. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
